revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Fortinet |model=FortiGate |revision=-50E (FG-50E) |serialnum_prefix=FGT50E |asin=B01FWC1DSI |newegg=9SIAGBA9KM4440 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WRTM-320N |manuf_rev=V02 |est_release_date=02/2016 |pcb_id=19K-W13-6900R |type=SD-WAN Router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=Molex (2-pin) |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6820 |cpu1_cspeed=1.6 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX66L1G45GMI-10G |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K512M8DA-107:P |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, RJ-45 console,, (9600 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1512 |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1512 |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6176 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=5 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=Low Power 3-5V, 250kbps RS232 Transceiver;Zywyn;ZT3232L;;1;,,, Hardware Monitoring IC w/ PECI 3.0 Interface;Nuvoton;NCT7802Y;;1;,,, 16-Bit I2C & SMBus I/O Expander w/ Interrupt Output;TI;TCA9555;;1;,,, 4.5-28V 3A Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;TI;TPS54336A;;1;,,, 3A Dual Channel Synchronous Step-Down Switcher;TI;TPS54394;;2;,,, 5A Step-Down Regulator w/ Integrated Switcher;TI;TPS53316;;1;,,, 1.8A Sink/Source Bus Termination Regulator;Richtek;RT9045;;1;,,, 3-State Octal Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;LVC244A;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, metal case, heat sink |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |default_ip=192.168.1.99 |default_user=admin |oui_eth=90:6C:AC }} {{TagLine|Secure SD-WAN Next Generation Firewall}} :[https://www.fortinet.com/content/dam/fortinet/assets/data-sheets/FortiGate_FortiWiFi_50E_Series.pdf Data Sheet]
"Model: P17457-03", "FG-51E", "Fortinet, Inc", "19K-W13-6900R RoHs", :and "WRTM-320N_V02" are silkscreened on board.
OEM: [[Gemtek]] WRTM-320N (V02)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820 ''Armada 385'' :Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.6GHz *Storage: 128MB SPI (NOR) Flash *Memory: 2GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 7x GbE ports *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port *Power Source: 12V/3A via 2-pin Molex
===Links=== *[https://www.corporatearmor.com/fortigate-50e/fortigate-50e-lets-take-a-closer-look/ ''FortiGate 50E – Let’s take a closer look'' on '''Corporate Armor'''] *[https://www.networkstraining.com/fortigate-comparison-30e-50e-60e/ ''Fortinet Fortigate 30E vs 50E/51E vs 60E/61E/60F'' on '''Networks Training''']
